name: VR Car Racing 3D for Google Cardboard
name_original: VR Car Racing 3D for Google Cardboard
description:
Press the Cardboard Trigger or look "START" button to start the game! Look left or right arrows to change car.

Tilt your head in the direction that you want to move the car.

Press the Cardboard Trigger or look brake button for the brake.

You have to go as fast as you can while following the given course and win the race!

This game is for Google Cardboard and other 3D mobile virtual reality headsets.

Learn more about Google Cardboard here:
https://www.google.com/get/cardboard/

Suitable for children and all ages.

Have fun !
